h2_title: Yellow Wind Ridge Awaken Wine Worm
content: The Awaken Wine Worm in Chapter 2 is in a small shack just above the area where you will fight the First Prince of Flowing Sands. You can see the glowing vase from outside the shack, but you will need to drop down and follow the path to the left to get behind the wall and smash the vase.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Awaken Wine Worm Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Ridge Awaken Wine Worm'.
The content is as follows:
The Awaken Wine Worm in Chapter 2 is in a small shack just above the area where you will fight the First Prince of Flowing Sands. You can see the glowing vase from outside the shack, but you will need to drop down and follow the path to the left to get behind the wall and smash the vase.
